sentence: Wisconsin Democratic Senate hopeful Alex Lasry is opening up his deep pockets again with a new seven-figure ad campaign, his first to attack Republican Sen. Ron Johnson directly, NBC News reports In Lasry's new spot, the candidate uses Johnson's support for Fla. GOP Sen. Rick Scott's policy plan as well as recent comments dismissing the importance of pushing for new USPS trucks to be built in the state to argue Johnson isn't on the side of working people.
title: Ukraine gets the U.S. gets a little more united  for now
